name: Sacrificial Ammunition
description:
Sacrificial Ammunition is a survival shooter that has you up against an infinite hoard of red enemies. You start with a magazine full of 5 bullets. In order to reload another 5, you must spend 10% of your HP. Avoid taking damage and make every shot count in order to take down enemies. Enemies may drop health pickups to replenish your health. How long can you last? (Full-screen for best results)

This is my first game, as well as my first Ludum Dare entry 😊
